name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Tech Lead with 13+ years of experience in **backend development** and **frontend development**, specializing in creating high-performance applications for the healthcare and financial sectors. Expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a proven track record in utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in developing internal tools and managing system documentation while ensuring scalability of infrastructure and maintaining compliance. 
Proficient in deploying cloud-native architectures on **AWS** and **Azure**, leveraging microservices and event-driven systems, with a strong foundation in technical project coordination and **CI/CD** implementation. Demonstrated excellence in communication, team collaboration, and maintaining an organized and proactive mindset. Fluent in English with working proficiency in Italian.
